nodes.text: Tee-muss were a domesticated species native to the planet Onderon and exported across the galaxy to planets such as Florrum, where they were used as battle mounts, or Felucia, where they were used by nysillin farmers.
During the Galactic Civil War, Orson Krennic wore gloves made from the hide of tee-muss calves. Tee-musses fed on the purple kings' crown shrub found in the highlands of Onderon.
